selectHubPanel.title: Select hub
selectHubPanel.message: Select the hub to restore the official {lego} firmware on, then click {next}.

ble.message: Then use the official {lego} app for this hub to connect to the hub and restore the firmware. Watch {thisVideo} to see how.

instruction2.dfu: Then click the {flashFirmware} button below to connect to the hub and flash the firmware. After flashing is complete, connect the hub to one of the official {lego} apps and use it to update to the latest official firmware.
